page.title: 18OUR HOUSES
page.content: ABOUT HALF THE CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL LIVE IN COUNCIL HOUSES AND HALF IN PRIVATE HOUSES. MOST OF THOSE IN COUNCIL HOUSES HAVE MOVED AT LEAST ONCE. MOST OF THOSE IN PRIVATE HOUSES STAY WHERE THEY ARE. THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF CHILDREN IN A FAMILY IS 2. EVERYBODY HAS A GARDEN AND ALL THE GARDENS HAVE FLOWERS, BUT NOT MANY HAVE VEGETABLES.ALMOST ALL OF THE HOUSES HAVE 3 BEDROOMS AND EVERYBODY HAS A BATHROOM.MOST PEOPLE HAD THESE THINGS AS WELL: CENTRAL HEATING, FITTED CARPETS,REFRIGERATOR,HOT AND COLD WATER.SOME HAD THESE THINGS AND EVERBODY SAID THEIR PARENTS WOULD LIKE THEM:FREEZER,MICROWAVE COOKER,DOUBLE GLAZED WINDOWS AND DOORS.HALF THE PEOPLE HAD GARAGES,THE REST PUT THEIR CAR IN THE STREET.
